org.deeplearning4j.arbiter

Class BaseNetworkSpace<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.arbiter.optimize.api.AbstractParameterSpace<T>
      • org.deeplearning4j.arbiter.BaseNetworkSpace<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of network (MultiLayerNetwork or ComputationGraph)
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParameterSpace<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputationGraphSpace, MultiLayerSpace

    public abstract class BaseNetworkSpace<T>
extends AbstractParameterSpace<T>
    This is an abstract ParameterSpace for both MultiLayerNetworks (MultiLayerSpace) and ComputationGraph (ComputationGraphSpace)

    Functionality here should match NeuralNetConfiguration.Builder

      • randomGlobalConf

        protected NeuralNetConfiguration.Builder randomGlobalConf(double[] values)

      • collectLeaves

        public java.util.List<ParameterSpace> collectLeaves()
        Description copied from interface: ParameterSpace
        Collect a list of parameters, recursively. Note that leaf parameters are parameters that do not have any nested parameter spaces

      • isLeaf

        public boolean isLeaf()
        Description copied from interface: ParameterSpace
        Is this ParameterSpace a leaf? (i.e., does it contain other ParameterSpaces internally?)

      • setIndices

        public void setIndices(int... indices)
        Description copied from interface: ParameterSpace
        For leaf ParameterSpaces: set the indices of the leaf ParameterSpace. Expects input of length ParameterSpace.numParameters(). Throws exception if ParameterSpace.isLeaf() is false.
        Parameters:
        indices - Indices to set. Length should equal ParameterSpace.numParameters()
